Contrary to what many would have expected, the older adult actually enjoyed not having a job and talked about how he even just embraces it when others call him a sloth and a drain on society, but the twenty-something only spent about two weeks out of work before finding a new employer. The job search was hard, but he said he was glad to have finally found a place to add value to.
question: Who is too lazy to work?
